January 7, 2021
GL_Alex
Venom gets Indomitable but Spider-Man didn't? A travesty. I would play this Venom, he is cheap for the points and has some good powers. Decent for most teams.
August 31, 2020
WelcomeToDIE
I'm thrilled that we're finally getting not one, but two Venom figures with the Spider-Man team ability and keyword! And yet, of the 3 Eddie Venom figures coming out, this one is actually the one I'm most excited for. Sure, he's lacking either the Spider-Man or Sinister Syndicate team ability but let's be honest, Eddie isn't usually in sync with his teammates. When Venom teams up with the bad guys, he usually decides later on "I don't want to help these guys anymore" and it gets ugly. When he teams up with the good guys, the "lethal" part of his "Lethal Protector" moniker usually causes friction. Speaking of lethal, that's what makes this guy such fun. Too often we see great powerful characters like Venom and Spidey have no more damage potential than your average Bat-brat. Not this time! With either Exploit on Blades to make those jaws HURT or 4 (!) natural damage this guy really plays like the brutal anti-hero Venom is. Even when he gets vanilla 3 damage he picks up Super Strength, but he's probably munched on enough folks or regenerated by that point, so you've got a lot of opportunity to put the hurt on those who would prey on the innocent! The giant reach also feels more like Venom than having a range, I see him lashing out or pulling folks in a lot more than shooting his symbiotic webs. All for only 75 or 50 points. Great Venom, great design. Well done Wizkids!
August 26, 2020
Slade Wilson
Feels like a good venom for 75 points durable and high damage potential on most clix.
